overview:
P150-2851AV9.7 is a comprehensive power conversion, backlight driven and
signal processing mainboard to support UHD LCD panel.During maintenance,pls
pay attentiond to do electrostatic protection to prevent the process of
maintenance caused by the driver plate causing secondary damage, especially for
the chips, MOS, crystal vibration and other sensitive devices directly connected to
the circuit .For chip of patch type, it is recommended to use hot air gun when
repairing and replacing, and the temperature should be set at about 340
degrees.When using the soldering iron, make sure whether the soldering iron has
electric leakage or not. The temperature should be set at about 340-360, and the
welding time should not be too long

This product is based on RTD2851A chip, a Google TV driver board developed
for the global market. Support 4K LCD screen. Electrostatic protection should be
done during maintenance, especially for the circuit directly connected to some
sensitive devices such as chips, MOS and crystal oscillator, so as to prevent
secondary damage to the driver board during maintenance. You are advised to use a
heat gun and set the temperature to about 340 degrees during maintenance and
replacement of chip patches. When using the soldering iron, confirm whether the
soldering iron leakage, welding time should not be too long

key_components.component_id: U27 WA15-6819B I2S power amplifier IC

overview:
P75-2841AV9.2 is a full HD
LCD driver board that integrates power conversion, backlight drive and signal processing.
The driver board is equipped with a high voltage conversion circuit. During maintenance,
pay attention to confirm whether the large electrolysis on the board has been discharged
to avoid electric shock. Especially for some chip, MOS, crystal oscillator and other
sensitive devices directly connected circuit, to prevent the process of maintenance caused
by the driver board secondary damage. You are advised to use a heat gun and set the
temperature to about 340 degrees during maintenance and replacement of chip patches.
When using the soldering iron, confirm whether the iron leakage, each solder joint
welding time should not be too long

EL.RT2864-FG48 is a full HD LCD driver board that integrates power conversion,
backlight driving and signal processing. It needs to be protected from static
electricity during maintenance, especially for circuits that are directly connected to
sensitive devices such as chips, MOS, and crystal oscillators. Prevent secondary
damage to the drive board during maintenance. For chip type chips, it is
recommended to use a hot air gun when repairing and replacing, and the
temperature should be set at about 340 degrees. When using a soldering iron,
confirm whether the soldering iron is leaking, the temperature is set at about 340-
360, and the soldering time should not be too long.

backlight driving and signal processing. It needs to be protected from static
electricity during maintenance, especially for some chips, MOS, crystal oscillators and
other sensitive devices directly connected. circuit to prevent secondary damage to
the driver board during maintenance. For chip type chips, it is recommended to use a
hot air gun when repairing and replacing, and the temperature should be set at
about 340 degrees. When using a soldering iron, confirm whether the soldering iron
is leaking, the temperature is set at about 340-360, and the soldering time should
not be too long.

overview: EL.RT2874-FG95 is a ultra-HD LCD driver board that integrates power conversion, backlight driving and signal processing. It needs to be protected from static electricity during maintenance, especially for some chips, MOS, crystal oscillators and other sensitive devices directly connected. circuit to prevent secondary damage to the driver board during maintenance. For chip type chips, it is recommended to use a hot air gun when repairing and replacing, and the temperature should be set at about 340 degrees. When using a soldering iron, confirm whether the soldering iron is leaking, the temperature is set at about 340-360, and the soldering time should not be too long.

overview: LT-2874WV6.2 is a fully high-definition LCD driver board that integrates backlight driving and signal processing. It is necessary to take electrostatic protection during maintenance, especially for circuits directly connected to sensitive devices such as chips, MOS, and crystal oscillators, to prevent secondary damage to the driver board during maintenance. For chip mounting type, it is recommended to use a Heat gun for maintenance and replacement, and the temperature should be set at about 340 ℃. When using soldering iron, confirm if there is any leakage, set the temperature at around 340-360, and do not weld for too long.
